## Volunteer {#volunteer}

We welcome students, public health professionals, and technical contributors.

Send:
- Short profile
- Area of interest
- Availability

## Partner With Us {#partner}

For collaborations with institutions, local governments, and implementation partners:

Email: [partnerships@epipulse.org]

Include:
- Organization profile
- Project geography
- Proposed collaboration scope

Official activation and payment details will be announced on the [Transparency](transparency.qmd) page under "Donation and Payment Status".

Volunteer onboarding and donor support are handled through separate processes and separate contact channels.
